string-array.item: Arkham Horror uses dice rolls to determine the outcome of a number of events in the game, including combat and skill checks. Each such event will have a stated difficulty, which is defined as the number of successed required to pass the event.

For some events in Arkham Horror, it is possible to attempt the check more than one time. An example is combat - if a monster deals a one point of damage per round of combat, and your character currently has three stamina, you can attempt the combat check three times before your characters is knocked unconscious.
